name: tbs1980.github.io
body:
# Welcome to Sreekumar Thaithara Balan's GitHub Page.
> I am an astrophysicist at [University College London](http://www.ucl.ac.uk/) working mainly on statistical data analysis of large cosmological data. I am also interested in high-performance computing, statistical inference, extra solar planets,... I code in many languages, e.g. C/C++, Fortran, Python, R, Matlab, CUDA, OpenCL etc. If you are interested in taking to me about cosmology, extra solar planets, computing, statistics please drop me an email at sbalan@star.ucl.ac.uk . 

## More info to come later...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
